data.name: labelDisplayNameFormat.Help
data.value: Format of the display name generated for user. Template variables for name parts are "FirstName", "LastName", "OtherName" and also "F.", "L.", "O." for first letters only.

data.name: labelUserNameFormat.Help
data.value: Format of the username generated for user. Template variables for name parts are "FirstName", "LastName", "OtherName", "Email" and also "F.", "L.", "O." for first letters only. Name parts will be transliterated and lowercased, all non-alphanumeric characters will be replaced with underscore.

data.name: labelRoles.Help
data.value: Comma-separated list of role names to assign to newly created users. If role with specified name doesn't exists, it will be ignored.

data.name: labelDoneUrl.Help
data.value: The custom URL to redirect after user was created. {userId}, {tabId} and {portalId} template variables supported. If "Open in Popup" checked, the URL will be opened in DNN popup (providing that popups are enabled in site settings).
